trans-unit.source: Provides methods to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 에 쓸 수 있는 메서드를 제공는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서 또는 인쇄 큐입니다.

trans-unit.source: XpsDocumentWriter has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: XpsDocumentWriter에 생성자를 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: To create an XpsDocumentWriter, use the static <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class or use one of the static <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: XpsDocumentWriter를 만들려면 정적 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>클래스 또는 정적 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>클래스</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> 의 메서드</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> 중 하나를 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 메서드</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> 를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The document or the queue that creates the XpsDocumentWriter becomes the target to which it writes.
trans-unit.target: 문서 또는 XpsDocumentWriter 만드는 큐에 기록 되는 대상 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 현재 취소 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>작업.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: No asynchronous write operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 쓰기 작업이 진행 중입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> 작성할 수 있는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 문서 또는 인쇄 큐 개체를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>동일한 대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>또는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> 을 야기 하는</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 다른 이름으로</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 기록</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> 작성할 수 있는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 개체와 함께 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> XPS 문서 또는 인쇄 큐 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>동일한 대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>또는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> 을 야기 하는</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 다른 이름으로</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 기록</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 유효성을 검사 하지 않거나 지정 된 수정 `documentPrintTicket` 특정 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 필요한 경우 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>만드는 메서드를 한 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>에 고유는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>하 고 지정 된 프린터에 대 한 유효한.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that specifies the default printing preferences for the document sequence.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> 문서 순서에 대 한 기본 인쇄 설정을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for each document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> 각 문서에 대 한 기본 인쇄 설정을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that writes <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> 쓰는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 요소 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> 설정을 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 지정 된 기록 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서를 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>클래스에는 하나의 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나일 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서 집합입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>요소 소스 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>또는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 요소</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 집합을</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: This Write method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 이 쓰기 메서드는 지정 된 reserialize [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 에서 모든 콘텐츠를 제거 하는 문서는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>가 보존 하는 데 필요 하지 않습니다는 [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: reserialization에서 모든 확장도 제거 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>확장을 포함 하 여 태그 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 콘텐츠.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: 의도적이 쓰기 메서드를 호출 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: 원본 문서의 경로입니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 동기적으로 페이지 매긴된 콘텐츠를 작성 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 번호가 매겨지지 않은 원본 자료에 대 한 포인터를 포함 하 고 또한 뿐 아니라 자료에 대 한 메서드를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 지정 된 기록 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>클래스에는 하나의 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나일 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서 집합입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> to the set.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>집합에.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A document that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 문서에 기록 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 지정 된 기록 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>클래스에는 하나의 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나일 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서 집합입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 집합이 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>요소를 사용 하 여 기존 집합.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A set of documents that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 문서에 기록 된 집합은 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 지정 된 기록 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A page that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 기록 하는 페이지는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 지정 된 기록 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 일괄 쓰기에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> 를 사용 하 여,</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 작성 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 지정 된 기록 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서를 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 때 `notificationLevel` 하지 않는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>serialize 된 복사[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서 대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 만든</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> 또는</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: 때 `notificationLevel` 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>먼저 문서를 역직렬화, 다음 reserializes, 한 다음 각 페이지에는 출력은 진행률 알림 사용 하는 대상을를 씁니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>클래스에는 하나의 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나일 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서 집합입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>소스 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>또는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 요소</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 시퀀스를 요소</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 추가

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `notificationLevel` 로 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, 문서 인쇄 되지 serialize 되는 경우에 알림이 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: 알림을 수신 하려면 문서를 다시 serialize 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: 문서는 다시 serialize 하는 경우에서 모든 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>가 보존 하는 데 필요 하지 않습니다는 [XPS XML Paper Specification ()](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: reserialization에서 모든 확장도 제거 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>확장을 포함 하 여 태그 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 콘텐츠.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `notificationLevel` 로 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>문서 다시 serialize 되지 것입니다 및 확장된 콘텐츠 인쇄 하는 경우에 유지 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.

trans-unit.target: 비동기적으로 지정 된 기록 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 대상 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 일괄 쓰기에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> 를 사용 하 여,</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 작성 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document with notification option to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 비동기적으로 지정 된 기록 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 대상에 알림 옵션을 사용 하 여 문서 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 때 `notificationLevel` 하지 않는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>serialize 된 복사 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서 대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 만든</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> 또는</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: 때 `notificationLevel` 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>먼저 문서를 역직렬화, 다음 reserializes, 한 다음 각 페이지에는 출력은 진행률 알림 사용 하는 대상을를 씁니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>클래스에는 하나의 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나일 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서 집합입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>소스 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>대상 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>또는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 요소</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 시퀀스를 요소</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 추가

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `notificationLevel` 로 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, 문서 인쇄 되지 serialize 되는 경우에 알림이 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: 알림을 수신 하려면 문서를 다시 serialize 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: 문서는 다시 serialize 하는 경우에서 모든 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>가 보존 하는 데 필요 하지 않습니다는 [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: reserialization에서 모든 확장도 제거 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>확장을 포함 하 여 태그 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 콘텐츠.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `notificationLevel` 로 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>문서 다시 serialize 되지 것입니다 및 확장된 콘텐츠 인쇄 하는 경우에 유지 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this WriteAsync method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: 의도적이 WriteAsync 메서드를 호출 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: 원본 문서의 경로입니다.
